name: CSSSupportsRule
description: The CSSSupportsRule interface describes an object representing a single CSS @supports at-rule. It implements the CSSConditionRule interface, and therefore the CSSRule and CSSGroupingRule interfaces with a type value of 12 (CSSRule.SUPPORTS_RULE).

refs.name: CSS Conditional Rules Module Level 3
refs.description: The definition of 'CSSSupportsRule' in CSS Conditional Rules Module Level 3.
